name: 3D Ninja Warrior Run (a platform shooting game)
name_original: 3D Ninja Warrior Run (a platform shooting game)
description:
Run, jump and slice your way through an ancient warrior land killing wave after wave of deadly ninjas.
Show your kung fu skills by doing flips and leaping over huge chasms. Shoot shurikens and deal death blows to those who dare challenge you. Make your way from the ninja school, through the fire caves, and to your final destination - the ice mountain.

Go now master and fulfill your destiny.
